Directions: In a bowl, stir all ingredients just until combined. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans. Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained
